name: mcp-conductor
description: A Node.js testing library for Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers

scripts.test:filesystem: node bin/conductor.js './examples/filesystem-server/filesystem.test.mcp.yml' --config './examples/filesystem-server/config.json' && node bin/conductor.js './examples/filesystem-server/advanced.test.mcp.yml' --config './examples/filesystem-server/config.json' && node bin/conductor.js './examples/filesystem-server/string-patterns.test.mcp.yml' --config './examples/filesystem-server/config.json'
scripts.test:examples: npm run test:filesystem && npm run test:multitool
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:examples && npm run test:programmatic
scripts.github-pages: cd docs-site && rm -f Gemfile.lock && bundle install --path vendor/bundle && bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload --host=0.0.0.0

author: Thomas Theunen
